# Czerniki, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Czerniki  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kętrzyn, within Kętrzyn County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  east of Kętrzyn and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
Historically, Polish-language services were held in the local church.
